mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.qiye_id as qiyeId ,a.shijianrenshu_chat_issue_text as shijianrenshuChatIssueText ,a.issue_time as issueTime ,a.shijianrenshu_chat_reply_text as shijianrenshuChatReplyText ,a.reply_time as replyTime ,a.zhuangtai_types as zhuangtaiTypes ,a.shijianrenshu_chat_types as shijianrenshuChatTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,qiye.qiye_name as qiyeName ,qiye.qiye_lianxiren as qiyeLianxiren ,qiye.qiye_phone as qiyePhone ,qiye.qiye_photo as qiyePhoto ,qiye.qiye_address as qiyeAddress ,qiye.qiye_email as qiyeEmail ,qiye.hangye_types as hangyeTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM shijianrenshu_chat a left JOIN qiye qiye ON a.qiye_id = qiye.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.qiye_id = #{params.qiyeId} )
and a.shijianrenshu_chat_issue_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shijianrenshuChatIssueText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.issue_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.issueTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.issue_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.issueTimeEnd})
and a.shijianrenshu_chat_reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shijianrenshuChatReplyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.reply_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.replyTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.reply_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.replyTimeEnd})
and a.zhuangtai_types = #{params.zhuangtaiTypes}
and a.shijianrenshu_chat_types = #{params.shijianrenshuChatTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.qiye_id IS NOT NULL
and qiye.qiye_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyeName},'%')
and qiye.qiye_lianxiren like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyeLianxiren},'%')
and qiye.qiye_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyePhone},'%')
and qiye.qiye_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyeAddress},'%')
and qiye.qiye_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiyeEmail},'%')
and qiye.hangye_types = #{params.hangyeTypes}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
